mapper.select: SELECT account FROM chat_group_account WHERE group_id = #{group_id} AND enable_flag = '1'
SELECT id,group_name,group_host,group_avatar FROM chat_group WHERE id IN( SELECT group_id FROM chat_group_account WHERE account = #{account} AND enable_flag = '1' ) AND enable_flag = '1'
SELECT id,group_name,group_host,group_avatar FROM chat_group WHERE id = #{group_id} AND enable_flag = '1'

SELECT cm.* FROM (SELECT ca.nickname,ca.gender,ca.avatar,gm.* FROM chat_account ca, (SELECT account as from_account, (CASE WHEN account=#{account} THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS from_flag, msg, (CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_timestamp) = 0 THEN DATE_FORMAT(create_timestamp,'%H:%i') WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_timestamp) = 1 THEN CONCAT('昨天',' ',DATE_FORMAT(create_timestamp,'%H:%i')) WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_timestamp) > 1 THEN DATE_FORMAT(create_timestamp,'%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') END) AS chat_time,create_timestamp FROM chat_group_message WHERE group_id = #{group_id} AND enable_flag = '1' ) as gm WHERE ca.account = gm.from_account ORDER BY gm.create_timestamp DESC LIMIT 30) cm ORDER BY cm.create_timestamp ASC
